hops.rawfrom: I'm fine with CC acting for third parties.  The principal CC contact for Wessex was Chris Bright, a regulatory lawyer (ex-Linklaters) who joined Shearman & Sterling a year ago.  If (and I mean if!) we sell Wessex, we'd want to use Chris for regulatory issues at least.

hops.rawfrom: Jim:  It's pretty bad out there as you know.  I don't know of anyone who is hiring in the Bay area, but I will keep on the lookout and pass this on to some others who may have a line on an opportunity.  Rich
